Notes.Text:
This update for raptor fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-57823: Fixed integer underflow when normalizing a URI with the turtle parser (bsc#1235673)
- CVE-2024-57822: Fixed heap buffer overread when parsing triples with the nquads parser (bsc#1235674)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: In Raptor RDF Syntax Library through 2.0.16, there is a heap-based buffer over-read when parsing triples with the nquads parser in raptor_ntriples_parse_term_internal().
